file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: When I was first learning to meditate, the instruction was to simply pay attention to my

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: breath and with my mind wandered to bring it back.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Sounded simple enough.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Yet, I'd sit on these silent retreats, sweating through t-shirts in the middle of winter.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: I'd take naps every chance I got because it was really hard work.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Actually, it was exhausting.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: The instruction was simple enough, but I was missing something really important.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: So why is it so hard to pay attention?

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Well studies show that even when we're really trying to pay attention to something, like

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: maybe this talk, at some point about half of us will drift off into a daydream or have

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: this urge to check our Twitter feed.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: So what's going on here?

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: It turns out that we're fighting one of the most evolutionarily conserved learning processes

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: currently known in science, one that's conserved back to the most basic nervous systems known

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: to man.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: This reward-based learning process is called positive and negative reinforcement and basically

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: goes like this.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: We see some food that looks good.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Our brain says, calories, survival.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: We eat the food, we taste it, it tastes good, and especially with sugar, our bodies send

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: a signal to our brain that says, remember what you're eating and where you found it.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: We lay down this context dependent memory and learn to repeat the process next time.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: See food, eat food, feel good, repeat.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Trigger, behavior, reward.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Simple right?

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Well after a while our creative brain say, you know what, you can use this for more than

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: just remembering where food is.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Even or next time you feel bad, why don't you try eating something good so you'll feel

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: better?

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: We think our brains are the great idea.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Try this and quickly learn that if we eat chocolate or ice cream when we're mad or sad

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: we feel better.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Same process, just a different trigger.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Instead of this hunger signal coming from our stomach, this emotional signal feeling

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: sad triggers that it's to eat.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Maybe in our teenage years we were a nerd at school and we see those rebel kids outside

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: smoking we think, hey I want to be cool so we start smoking.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: The Marlboro man wasn't adoric and that was no accident.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: See cool, smoke to be cool, feel good, repeat.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Trigger, behavior, reward.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: And each time we do this we learn to repeat the process and it becomes a habit.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: So later feeling stressed out triggers that urge to smoke a cigarette or to eat something

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: sweet.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Now with these same brain processes we've gone from learning to survive to literally

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: killing ourselves with these habits.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Obesity and smoking among the leading preventable causes of morbidity and mortality in the world.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: So back to my breath, what if instead of fighting our brains or trying to force ourselves

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: to pay attention we instead tapped into this natural reward based learning process but

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: added a twist.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: What if instead we just got really curious about what was happening in our momentary experience.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: I'll give you an example.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: In my lab we studied whether mindfulness training could help people quit smoking.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Now just like trying to force myself to pay attention on my breath they could try to

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: force themselves to quit smoking and the majority of them had tried this before and failed

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: on average six times.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Now with mindfulness training we dropped a bit about forcing and instead focused on being

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: curious.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: In fact we even told them to smoke.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: What?

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: We said go ahead and smoke just be really curious about what is like when you do and what

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: did they notice.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Well here's an example from one of our smokers.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: She said mindful smoking smells like stinky cheese and tastes like chemicals.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Yuck!

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Now she knew cognitively that smoking was bad for her.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: That's why she joined our program.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: What she discovered just by being curiously aware when she smoked was that smoking tastes

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: like shit.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Now she moved from knowledge to wisdom.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: She moved from knowing in her head that smoking was bad for her to knowing it in her bones.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: And the spell of smoking was broken.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: She started to become disenchanted with her behavior.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Now the prefrontal cortex that youngest part of our brain from an evolutionary perspective

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: it understands on an intellectual level that we shouldn't smoke and it tries its hardest

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: to help us change our behavior to help us stop smoking to help us stop eating that second

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: that third that fourth cookie.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: We call this cognitive control.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: We're using cognition to control our behavior.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Unfortunately this is also the first part of a brain that goes offline when we get stressed

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: out which isn't that helpful.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Now we can all relate to this in our own experience.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: We're much more likely to do things like yell at our spouser kids when we're stressed

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: out or tired even though we know it's not going to be helpful.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: We just can't help ourselves.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Now when the prefrontal cortex goes offline we fall back into our whole habits which is

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: why this disenchantment is so important.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Seeing what we get from our habits helps us understand them in a deeper level to know

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: it in our own bones so we don't have to force ourselves to hold back or restrain ourselves

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: from behavior.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: We're just less interested in doing it in the first place.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: This is what mindfulness is all about.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Seeing really clearly what we get when we get caught up in our behaviors.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Becoming disenchanted on a visceral level and from this disenchanted stance naturally

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: letting go.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: This isn't to say that poof magically we quit smoking but over time as we learn to see

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: more and more clearly the results of our actions we let go of old habits and form new ones.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: The paradox here is that mindfulness is just about being really interested in getting

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: close and personal with what's actually happening in our bodies and minds from moment to moment.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: This willingness to turn toward our experience rather than trying to make unpleasant cravings

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: go away as quickly as possible.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: And this willingness to turn toward our experience is supported by curiosity which is naturally

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: rewarding.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: What does curiosity feel like?

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: It feels good.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: And what happens when we get curious?

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: We start to notice that cravings are simply made up of body sensations.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Oh, there's tightness, there's tension, there's restlessness and that these body sensations

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: come and go.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: These are bite-sized pieces of experiences that we can manage for a moment to moment rather

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: than getting clobbered by this huge scary craving that we choke on.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: In other words, when we get curious we step out of our old fear-based reactive habit patterns

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: and we step into being.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: We become this inner scientist where we're eagerly awaiting that next data point.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Now this might sound too simplistic to affect behavior but in one study we found that mindfulness

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: training was twice as good as gold standard therapy at helping people quit smoking.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: So it actually works.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: And when we studied the brains of experienced meditators we found that parts of a neural

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: network of self-referential processing called the default mode network were at play.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Now one current hypothesis is that a region of this network called the posterior cingulate

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: cortex is activated not necessarily by craving itself but when we get caught up in it, when

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: we get sucked in and it takes us for a ride.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: In contrast when we let go, step out of the process just by being curiously aware of what's

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: happening, this same green region quiets down.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Now we're testing app and online-based mindfulness training programs that target these core mechanisms

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: and ironically use the same technology that's driving us to distraction to help us step

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: out of our unhealthy habit patterns of smoking, of stress eating, and other addictive behaviors.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Now remember that bit about context dependent memory?

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: We can deliver these tools to people's fingertips in the context that matter most.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: So we can help them tap into their inherent capacity to be curiously aware right when

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: that urge to smoke or stress eat or whatever arises.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: So if you don't smoke or stress eat, maybe the next time you feel this urge to check

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: your email when you're bored or you're trying to distract yourself from work or maybe to

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: compulsively respond to that text message when you're driving, see if you can tap into

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: this natural capacity just be curiously aware of what's happening in your body and mind

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: in that moment.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: It will just be another chance to perpetuate one of our endless and exhaustive habit loops

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: or step out of it.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Instead of seat text message, compulsively text back, feel a little bit better.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Notice the urge, get curious, feel the joy of letting go, and repeat.

file: A Simple Way to Break a Bad Habit ｜ Judson Brewer ｜ TED.webm
text: Thank you.
